subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony was born for such situations, which began with the bad and turned into the presumably catastrophic when Amar’e Stoudemire went down with back spasms in the second quarter.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony was born for such situations, which began with the bad and turned into the presumably catastrophic when Amar’e Stoudemire went down with back spasms in the second quarter.
